info.description: API for LibRate, a social media cataloguing and reviewing service
info.title: LibRate

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3

post.description: Retrieve the artists with the given names
Delete the account of the currently logged in user
Create a session for the user

parameters.description: Member name. Request must include either membername or email
parameters.name: membername

patch.description: Change the password for the currently logged in user

get.description: Retrieve the genre with the given name and type
Retrieve the list of genres of the specified type

parameters.description: Return only genre names. Usually used for populating dropdowns
parameters.name: names_only

parameters.description: Return the genre names as links
parameters.name: as_links

parameters.description: Return all genres, not only the ones without a parent genre (e.g. Twee Pop and Jangle Pop instead of just Pop)
parameters.name: all

get.description: Retrieve complete media information for the given media ID
Get the full cast and crew involved with the creation of the media with given ID
get.summary: Get the cast of the media with given ID

parameters.description: The UUID of the media to get the cast of
parameters.name: media_id

get.description: Retrieve the image paths for the media with the given ID
Exports the data of a member, including profile information as well as other related data such as reviews
get.summary: Export all of the member's data

post.description:
Send a follow request to another user. If the user has automatic follow request acceptance
enabled, the follow request will be accepted immediately.
post.summary: Send a follow request to a member (user)

parameters.description: The requester's JWT. Contains encrypted claims to the webfinger
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The webfinger of the member to follow
parameters.name: followee

parameters.description: Receive notifications for all content created by the followee
parameters.name: notify

parameters.description: Show this account's reblogs in home timeline
parameters.name: reblogs

204.description: When the followee is already followed

403.description: When at least one party blocks the other

delete.description: Unfollow a member or remove follower

parameters.description: The webfinger of the member to unfollow
parameters.name: target

get.description: Get own received follow requests or sent follow requests

parameters.description: The JWT of the member. Contains encrypted claims to webfinger
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: Which follow requests should be looked up
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: The ID of the follow request
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: The webfinger of the member who requested to follow
parameters.name: follower

parameters.description: The ID of the follow request
parameters.name: id

delete.description: Cancel a sent follow request if it's pending

parameters.description: The ID of the follow request
parameters.name: id

get.description: Check if a member is followed by the request initiator
get.summary: Check if a member is followed

parameters.description: The webfinger of the member to check
parameters.name: followee_webfinger

get.description: Retrieve the information the requester is allowed to see about a member
get.summary: Get a member (user) by nickname or email

parameters.description: The nickname or email of the member to get
parameters.name: email_or_username

401.description: When certain access prerequisites are not met, e.g. a follower's only-visible metadata is requested

post.description: issues a ban to a user with the given UUID

parameters.description: UUID of the member to ban
parameters.name: uuid

delete.description: removes a ban from a user with the given UUID

parameters.description: UUID of the member to unban
parameters.name: uuid

get.description: Search for media, users, posts, artists, etc.
get.summary: Perform a search for the given query and options

parameters.description: CSRF token. Required when using POST.
parameters.name: X-CSRF-Token

parameters.description: The search query. Falls back to a wildcard query if not provided.
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: The aggregations to perform on the search results
parameters.name: aggregations

parameters.description: Whether to perform a fuzzy search
parameters.name: fuzzy

parameters.description: The field to sort the results by
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Whether to sort the results in descending order
parameters.name: desc

parameters.description: The number of results to return per page
parameters.name: pageSize

post.description: Search for media, users, posts, artists, etc.
post.summary: Perform a search for the given query and options

parameters.description: CSRF token. Required when using POST.
parameters.name: X-CSRF-Token

parameters.description: The search query. Falls back to a wildcard query if not provided.
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: The aggregations to perform on the search results
parameters.name: aggregations

parameters.description: Whether to perform a fuzzy search
parameters.name: fuzzy

parameters.description: The field to sort the results by
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Whether to sort the results in descending order
parameters.name: desc

parameters.description: The number of results to return per page
parameters.name: pageSize

patch.description: Handle updating those member properties that can be exposed publicly, i.e. not settings

parameters.description: The nickname of the member being updated
parameters.name: member_name

parameters.description: ID of the picture that is returned after making a request to /api/upload/image
parameters.name: profile_pic_id

parameters.description: The nickname of the member being updated
parameters.name: member_name

parameters.description: The lower bound of the rating scale
parameters.name: rating_scale_lower

parameters.description: The upper bound of the rating scale
parameters.name: rating_scale_upper

parameters.description: A comma-separated list of words to autohide in messages
parameters.name: message_autohide_words

parameters.description: A comma-separated list of instance domains to mute
parameters.name: muted_instances

parameters.description: Whether to automatically accept follow requests
parameters.name: auto_accept_follow

parameters.description: Whether to allow robots to index the profile
parameters.name: robots_searchable

description.example: Typified by highly distorted, trebly, tremolo-picked guitars, blast beats, double kick drumming, shrieked vocals, and raw, underproduced sound that often favors atmosphere over technical skills and melody.

status.description:
when checking status, we treat not_found as not following
but when creating a request, we treat not_found as target account not existing

bio.example: Wherever you go, everyone is connected.

followers_uri.description: URI for getting the followers list of this account

following_uri.description: URI for getting the following list of this account
